column1: Ricardo Ferreiro de Aguiar; RicardoFerreiroDev; SocialLink; https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.5235823; SocialLink is a Linked Open Data dataset that links Twitter accounts to entities in DBpedia
column2: facilitating knowledge transfer between social media and the Semantic Web. So on the one hand
column3: it supports Semantic Web practitioners in better harvesting the vast amounts of valuable
column4: up-to-date information available in Twitter; on the other hand
column5: it permits Social Media researchers to leverage DBpedia data when processing the noisy
